name: Dockarmaiii
body:
# DockArmaIII
Arma III dedicated Docker container

This is a generic docker container that will enable you to run an Arma III server in the cloud

### Requirements
Docker 1.4.1+ Everything else runs in the container

### Usage

First download using the above links or clone the repo directly

simply update your username and password in the steamer.txt file

Then type `make run`

now type docker ps you should see your container running
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
